# type

**Instance Property**

Returns the type of the event.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var type: UIEvent.EventType { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEvent/EventType] constant returned by this property indicates the general type of this event — for example, whether it’s a touch or motion event.

## Getting the event type

- **UIEvent.EventType**: Constants that specify the general type of an event.
- **subtype**: Returns the subtype of the event.
- **UIEvent.EventSubtype**: Constants that specify the subtype of the event in relation to its general type.
